다양한_예제_템플릿을_자유롭게_활용해보세요: Feel free to use various example templates.
발신_목적과_핵심_내용을_입력하면_완성된_이메일을_작성해드립니다: Enter the purpose and content of the email, we will write a complete email.
홍보_주제_언어_포함할_내용을_입력하면_보도자료나_뉴스_기사를_작성해드립: Enter the topic, and content, and we will write a press release or news article.
제품_정보_홍보_키워드_등을_입력하면_홍보_문구를_작성해드립니다: Enter product information, promotion keywords, etc., and we will write promotional text.
영상_주제와_포함할_내용을_입력하면_영상_스크립트를_작성해드립니다: Enter the video topic and content to include, and we will write a video script.
문서_전체를_복사하여_붙여넣어주세요_핵심_내용을_요약해드립니다: Copy and paste the entire document, and we will summarize the key content.
내용을_입력하면_교정_교열을_포함한_문서_첨삭을_해드립니다: Enter the content, and we will proofread the document including correction.
한국어_텍스트를_입력하면_영문으로_번역해드립니다: Enter Korean text, and we will translate it into English.
문서를_입력하고_분석_방향을_제시하면_분석한_내용을_제공합니다: Enter the document and provide the analyzed content by suggesting the analysis direction.
프로그래밍_언어를_선택하고_코딩_목적을_입력하면_코드를_작성해드립니다: Select a programming language and enter the coding purpose, and we will write the code.
원하는_홍보_주제를_입력하고_기사에_반드시_포함할_내용을_입력하세요: Enter the desired promotion topic and the content that must be included in the article.
포함할_내용을_입력해주세요: Please enter the content to include.
문서_내용을_입력하면_교정_교열을_포함한_문서_첨삭을_해드립니다: Enter the content, and we will proofread the document including correction.
원하는_이메일_작성_유형을_선택하고_핵심_내용을_입력해주세요: Please select the type of e-mail you want, and enter your core content.
메일에_담고_싶은_핵심_내용을_입력하세요: Please write the key content you want to include in the email.
내용이_클립보드에_복사되었습니다: Contents has been copied to the clipboard.
이메일_원문_내용을_입력하세요: Please enter the original content of the email.
회의록_초안을_등록하고_내용_요약과_주요_결정사항을_정리해보세요: You can summarize the minutes by entering the meeting content.
작성하신_회의록_초안을_입력해주세요: Please write the draft of the minutes you've created.
한국어_텍스트를_입력하고_영어로_번역해보세요: Enter Korean text and translate it into English.
회의_목적을_입력해주세요: Please enter the purpose of the meeting.
원하는_내용을_입력하여_테이블을_생성할_수_있습니다: You can create a table by entering the desired content.
작성하고자_하는_언어를_선택하여_원하는_코드의_내용을_입력하세요: Select the language you want to write and enter the content of the desired code.
원하는_주제_및_키워드를_입력하세요: Enter the desired topic and keywords.
샘플_문구_생성_개수: Number of Sample Phrases to Generate
1에서_20사이의_숫자를_입력해주세요: Please enter a number between 1 and 20.
원하는_주제를_입력하고_스크립트에_포함할_내용을_입력하세요: Enter the desired topic and the content to be included in the script.
포함할_내용을_입력하세요: Please enter the content to include.
요약을_원하는_내용을_입력해주세요: Please enter the content you want to summarize.
제한_문장_수_입력: Enter the number of limited sentences
교정_및_교열을_원하는_내용을_입력하세요: Enter the content you want to correct and proofread.
번역이_필요한_내용을_입력하고_원하는_번역_언어를_선택하세요: Please enter Korean text and translate it into English.
분석을_원하는_문서의_내용을_입력하고_분석_상세_요청_내용을_입력하세요: Enter the content of the document you want to analyze and enter the detailed analysis request content.
분석_상세_요청_내용을_입력하세요: Please enter the detailed analysis request content.
초코빵예시: Choco Bread: Q1 Sales (100 units), Q2 Sales (300 units)
테이블항목예시: Column 1 Name, Column 2 Name, Column 3 Name...
코드예시: Write a logic to merge multiple Excel files into one.
홍보에_포함할_내용을_입력하세요: Please enter the content to include in the promotion.
